fields.name: Gal Gallop
fields.details: Don't have to be fast or able to run 20 miles for this one. Only requirement is to not be a guy! It's all about having fun in a supportive, non-competitive trail environment. Goes at the pace of the slowest runner -- beginner-friendly. Runs on the Kansas River "Sandrat" trails. (Bring a light in the winter seasons).
fields.location: Meet in the trailhead parking lot just off 8th & Oak in north Lawrence.

fields.name: Humpday Run
fields.details: Run about 5.5 to 12 miles on technical trail. Sometimes go out for dinner after. Don't forget to bring a headlamp and water.
fields.location: Meet at the Corps of Engineers parking lot, Clinton Lake north shore trail head

fields.name: Beginners Run
fields.details: An easy-paced run of five miles or less on the Kansas River "Sandrat" trails. Bring a water bottle and a light. Good for veteran trail runners too, who just want to get some nice easy miles in.
fields.location: Meet in the trailhead parking lot just off 8th & Oak in north Lawrence.

fields.name: Saturday Long Run
fields.details: Normally do about 10 -30 miles on technical trail, though there are plenty of turn-arounds if you want to go shorter. Field trips to Perry Lake for long runs there are planned for later this summer.
fields.location: Meet at the Corps of Engineers parking lot, Clinton Lake north shore trail head
